body_content.explanation: the part of a phone in two parts that you hold to your ear and mouth:
examples: She picked up the receiver and dialled his number.

body_content.explanation: a piece of equipment that changes radio and television signals into sounds and pictures
a person who officially deals with the business matters of companies who cannot pay their debts:
examples: The company went bankrupt and was put into the hands of the receivers.

body_content.explanation: A receiver of stolen goods is a person who buys and sells property that they know has been stolen.
in American football, an attacking player who is usually on the outer edge of the line of scrimmage (= the line on which the ball is positioned at the beginning of play):
examples: He's a wide receiver for the Dallas Cowboys.
